title: Cloud Architect & DevOps Engineer - Brian Boreiko
description: Cloud Architect & DevOps Engineer from Buenos Aires, Argentina. Specialist in AWS, GCP, Huawei Cloud, Docker, and Kubernetes.

hero.title: Hi, I’m Brian Boreiko!
hero.job_title: Cloud Architect & DevOps Engineer from Buenos Aires, Argentina.
hero.description: Specialist in AWS, GCP, Huawei Cloud, Docker, and Kubernetes.

jobs_description.title: Pre-production and QA Specialist
jobs_description.description: At HiperPBX, I automate software testing using tools like Selenium, Playwright, and Prometheus. I also manage servers, handling Linux and Docker environments, optimizing infrastructure, and ensuring service availability. My responsibilities include continuous integration and system monitoring with Grafana.
list: Testing of fixes and new features (QA)

jobs_description.title: SysAdmin
jobs_description.description: I performed level 1 and later level 2 technical support tasks, managing a portfolio of 18 clients. My tasks included remote and on-site support, at both hardware and software levels. I also carried out server and network maintenance tasks.

projects.title: I-66 Express Lanes
projects.description: System integration project for telephone systems with Microsoft CRM for the toll company of Interstate Route 66 in Virginia, USA. The project was carried out with Telefónica Global Solutions and deployed in 1 month.

projects.title: Ministry of the Environment of Argentina
projects.description: Migration project from analog to IP telephony for the Ministry of the Environment in Buenos Aires, Argentina. The project was carried out with Sandra Luciana Vittoriano, head of the IT department, and took 2 months, involving the implementation, configuration, and training of all employees.

projects.title: Frávega
projects.description: Migration project from Cisco UC telephony to IP at Frávega's distribution center in Monte Grande, Buenos Aires. The project was carried out with Sindy Araque, head of the networks and communications department at Frávega, lasting 1 and a half months. It involved the implementation and deployment of equipment, as well as the portability of telephone trunks connected to the previous system. I also migrated Cisco phone software to support the SIP protocol instead of SCCP.

projects.title: PedidosYa!
projects.description: I led the PoC for the migration of the agent system for PedidosYa!, along with IT Manager Matías Julio. The objective was to replicate the current system and plan the necessary improvements required by the client, as well as organize and document the hot migration from the current system to the new one.

contributions.title: HiperMe
contributions.description: Together with the development team, I currently collaborate on the continuous improvement of the platform, proposing changes, testing them, and designing the application with good UX/UI practices.

contributions.title: Contact Center
contributions.description: Unlike HiperMe, I collaborate with a third-party development team in charge of the Contact Center for HiperPBX. Here, in addition to development suggestions, we add functionality tests manually and actively develop automated tests with Playwright. I also review test results and performance with Grafana and k6.

contributions.title: HiperManager
contributions.description: Together with the internal development team, we developed this tool for clients to manage their PBX Cloud from anywhere in the world. I handled performance and functionality testing.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Systems Engineering student at the National Technical University and DevOps Engineer at EducacionIT/Manhattan University
about.description: I am an SRE with over 2 years of experience, having worked in support and project management. Currently, I work at HiperPBX. I have a technical focus on quality control and software testing, ensuring the efficiency and quality of the services we offer. I use technologies such as Selenium, Playwright, and Grafana, among many others. I’m also involved with cloud providers like AWS, GCP, and Huawei Cloud. Currently, I’m responsible for test automation and pre-production process optimization.

contact.title: Looking for new team members?
contact.subtitle: I can be part of your team
